name: others-fulstackopen-part3
description: This repo contains my submission in part 3 of the course Fullstackopen.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../osa2/materiaali/notes-new && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../osa3/notes-backend/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
